price: 69. Ya sôló, baye bandimi, mpe bayuda na ba swâbi-ûna(1) mpe baklisto, oyo akondima kati na bango na Allah mpe na mokolo ya suka mpe asali mosala ya malamu, bazala na bobangi te, bazala na mpasi mpe te na mitema na bango.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَٱلَّذِينَ هَادُواْ وَٱلصَّٰبِـُٔونَ وَٱلنَّصَٰرَىٰ مَنۡ ءَامَنَ بِٱللَّهِ وَٱلۡيَوۡمِ ٱلۡأٓخِرِ وَعَمِلَ صَٰلِحٗا فَلَا خَوۡفٌ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وَلَا هُمۡ يَحۡزَنُونَ
footnotes: 1 Swâbi-ûna: Bótala yango na suratu Al-Baqarah: 62.

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna āmanū wa-alladhīna hādū wal-ṣābiūna wal-naṣārā man āmana bil-lahi wal-yawmi al-ākhiri waʿamila ṣāliḥan falā khawfun ʿalayhim walā hum yaḥzanūna
